remarks: Functionality and domain of the partial isomorphism B. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dibfn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dibfn.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dibfn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibfn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibfnN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> I Fn { x e. B | x .<_ W } ) $.
$d .<_ x $.
$d B x $.
$d K x $.
$d W x $.
